com.blockhaus2000.util

Class PermissionUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.blockhaus2000.util.PermissionUtil

  • public class PermissionUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a utility class for easy permission check.

    Blockhaus2000

    • Constructor Detail

      • PermissionUtil

    • Method Detail

      • hasPermission

        public static boolean hasPermission(org.bukkit.command.CommandSender sender,
                    java.lang.String perm)
        Checks that the given CommandSender has the given permission.
        Parameters:
        sender - The CommandSender that has to have the given permission.
        perm - The permission that the given CommandSender has to have.
        Returns:
        A boolean value that the given CommandSender has the given PermissionUtil. Will return true in the following cases:
        • the given permission is null
        • the given permission is empty
        • the given CommandSender is not an instance of Player
        • the given CommandSender has the given permission
        Otherwise, this will return false.

      • hasPermission

        public static boolean hasPermission(org.bukkit.command.CommandSender sender,
                    SimpleDynamicPluginCommand cmd)
        Checks that the given CommandSender has the permission of the given DynamicPluginCommand. Will call hasPermission(CommandSender, String) with the permission of the given DynamicPluginCommand.
        Parameters:
        sender - The CommandSender that has to have the permission of the given DynamicPluginCommand.
        cmd - The DynamicPluginCommand that contains the permission for check for.
        Returns:
        The returned value of hasPermission(CommandSender, String)
        See Also:
        hasPermission(org.bukkit.command.CommandSender, java.lang.String)
